title: Waste Disposal by Burning) Regulations 2009 (S.I. 286 of 2009) as amended
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Waste Management (Prohibition
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Waste Management (Prohibition 

of Waste Disposal by Burning) (Amendment) Regulations 2023. 

Interpretation
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited waste management (prohibition waste disposal burning) (amendment) regulation 2023 interpretation

title: Waste Disposal by Burning) Regulations 2009 (S.I. 286 of 2009) as amended
heading: 2. “Principal Regulations” means the Waste Management (Prohibition of
text_raw:
2. “Principal Regulations” means the Waste Management (Prohibition of 
Waste Disposal by Burning) Regulations 2009 (S.I. 286 of 2009) as amended 
by the Waste Management (Prohibition of Waste Disposal by Burning) 
(Amendment) Regulations 2013 (S.I. 504 of 2013), the Waste Management 
(Prohibition of Waste Disposal by Burning) (Amendment) Regulations 2015 
(S.I. 538 of 2015), the Waste Management (Prohibition of Waste Disposal by 
Burning) (Amendment) Regulations 2017 (S.I. 599 of 2017), the Waste 
Management (Prohibition of Waste Disposal by Burning) (Amendment) 
Regulations 2019 (S.I. 684 of 2019), the Waste Management (Prohibition of 
Waste Disposal by Burning) (Amendment) Regulations 2020 (S.I. 738 of 2020) 
and the Waste Management (Prohibition of Waste Disposal by Burning) 
(Amendment) Regulations 2022 (S.I. 51 of 2022). 

Amendment of the Principal Regulations

title: Waste Disposal by Burning) Regulations 2009 (S.I. 286 of 2009) as amended
heading: 3. The Principal Regulations are amended by substituting for Regulation 6
text_raw:
3. The Principal Regulations are amended by substituting for Regulation 6 

the following: 

“Cessation of the permissible disposal of waste by burning
text_norm: 3 principal regulation amended substituting regulation 6 following cessation permissible disposal waste burning

title: Waste Disposal by Burning) Regulations 2009 (S.I. 286 of 2009) as amended
heading: 6. The burning of waste in compliance with Regulation 5(1) (a) and 5(1)
text_raw:
6. The burning of waste in compliance with Regulation 5(1) (a) and 5(1) 
(b) shall cease on 1 March 2023 but will be allowed for a further three month 
period from 1 September 2023 to 30 November 2023.”. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 31st January, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [16] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

27 January, 2023. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for the Environment, 
Climate and Communications.

title: Waste Disposal by Burning) Regulations 2009 (S.I. 286 of 2009) as amended
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The purpose of these regulations is to extend until 1 March 2023 an exemption 
provided for under the Waste Management (Prohibition of Waste Disposal by 
Burning) Regulations 2009 (S.I. 286 of 2009) which exists to allow farmers, in 
accordance with the waste hierarchy and as a last resort, to dispose of wastes 
generated by agricultural practices. The regulations also allow for a further 
three month period 1 September 2023 to 30 November 2023 during which 
time, the exemption will continue to apply. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [16] 5
